name: Gary's Garage
description:
Gary's Garage was made (mostly) in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2020.

With profits falling, Gary must find ways to bring more cuistomers into his repair shop. Sneaking out at night and dinging a few cars seems to work well. Just don't get caught by the authorities!

Created by:

  • Moustafa Elsisy
  • Nathan Peckham
  • Daniel Power

Changelog:

v0.3

- Fixed various bugs with patrols

v0.2

- Fixed textures layers not displaying in correct order

- Fixed bug which prevented upgrades from being properly applied

- Added boundaries to layers

v0.1

- Initial release
